suggestions.title: Define Daily Goals
suggestions.description: Outline top priorities and tasks for a productive day.

chats.message: I recommend starting your day by defining clear goals. Consider drafting a priority list.
What should I include in the list?
Include urgent tasks, scheduled meetings, and personal targets for a balanced plan.

suggestions.title: Process Overnight Emails
suggestions.description: Sort and flag important messages received overnight.

chats.message: Your inbox is busy; filtering overnight emails can help you focus.
How should I prioritize them?
Sort by sender importance and flag those with urgent subjects.

suggestions.title: Review Market Reports
suggestions.description: Analyze key market updates and economic data to inform decisions.

chats.message: Reviewing market reports can provide valuable insights for your day.
Which reports are most critical?

chats.message: A quick sync can help coordinate your team's daily priorities.
What topics should we cover?

suggestions.title: Draft Daily Briefing
suggestions.description: Prepare a concise summary of the day's planned activities.

chats.message: Drafting a daily briefing can help structure your workflow efficiently.

Include key tasks, meetings, and critical updates for your schedule.
